entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Yellowknife
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:32 PM MST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -26.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Yellowknife Airport 2:00 PM MST Saturday 18 February 2023
Condition: Mainly Sunny
Temperature: -26.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -32
Dewpoint: -30.0°C
Wind: NW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1
